meanings.definition: The anniversary of the day on which a person was born.
meanings.sent1: Birthdays are special days to celebrate the day someone was born.
meanings.sent2: We always have cake on birthdays to mark the anniversary of our birth.
meanings.sent3: For his birthday, he received a big surprise gift that made him smile.
meanings.sent4: Her birthday was like a bright star in the sky, shining with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of birthdays fills the air with joy and laughter.

meanings.definition: The day or anniversary of a person's birth.
meanings.sent1: On birthdays, we gather to celebrate the day someone came into the world.
meanings.sent2: She received many presents on her birthday, making it a special day.
meanings.sent3: His birthday cake was so huge, it could feed the whole neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: The birthday party was a colorful explosion of happiness and fun.
meanings.sent5: The memories made on birthdays last a lifetime.
